body:
Comment 11 by **runner.mei**: 
I clone repo to go_src2, and do above, and still build failed.

F:\developing\go\go_src2>echo %GOROOT%
%GOROOT%

F:\developing\go\go_src2>echo %GOPATH%
%GOPATH%

F:\developing\go\go_src2\src>go env
'go' 不是内部或外部命令，也不是可运行的程序
或批处理文件。

F:\developing\go\go_src2\src>echo %PATH%
C:\Program Files (x86)\NVIDIA Corporation\PhysX\Common;C:\Program Files\Common
Files\Microsoft Shared\Windows Live;C:\Pr
ogram Files (x86)\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Windows Live;C:\Program Files
(x86)\Intel\iCLS Client\;C:\Program Files\

Files\Calibre2\;f:\tools\mingw64\bin

0 files updated, 0 files merged, 0 files removed, 0 files unresolved

F:\developing\go\go_src2>cd src

F:\developing\go\go_src2\src>all.bat
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool.
go tool dist: F:\developing\go\go_src2\src\cmd\prof should not exist in release build

F:\developing\go\go_src2\src>echo %GOPATH%
%GOPATH%

F:\developing\go\go_src2\src>echo %GOROOT%
%GOROOT%

F:\developing\go\go_src2\src>hg parents

tag:         tip
user:        Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
date:        Tue Jul 30 22:58:38 2013 -0400
summary:     runtime: ARM _sfloat has no arguments
